column2: "Asɛm a ofi EWURADZE nkyɛn baa Jeremia hɔ
column3: aber a aweɔmfo safohen Nebuzaradan gyaa no wɔ Rama n'ekyir no
column4: ber a ɔfaa no dɛ ɔda nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn mu wɔ Jerusalɛm na Juda ndɔmmumfo a wɔdze hɔn rokɔ Babilɔn ndɔmmum no mu no."
EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn na ɔkaa mbusu yi baa bea yi do:"

column3: na ɔayɛ dɛ mbrɛ ɔkae no; osiandɛ hom ayɛ bɔn etsia EWURADZE
column5: dɛm ntsi na adze yi aba hom do yi."

column4: Masan wo ndɛ da yi efi nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn a ɔda wo nsa no mu. Sɛ ehwɛ na oye ma wo dɛ enye me bɔkɔ Babilɔn a
column6: na mobɔhwɛ wo yie; na sɛ ehwɛ na omuo ma wo dɛ enye me bɔkɔ Babilɔn a
column8: asaase no nyina da w'enyim; beebiara a ehwɛ a oye na ɔyɛ ahomka ma wo dɛ ebɔkɔ no

column4: San mbɔ na kɔ Safan ba Ahikam ne ba Gedalia a Babilɔnhen ahyɛ no ambrado wɔ Juda nkurow do no
column5: na kɛtsena ne nkyɛn wɔ ɔman no mu: anaa kɔ beebiara a ehwɛ a ibenya ahomka dɛ ebɔkɔ no. Nna aweɔmfo safohen no maa no akwantu mu edziban na ahyɛdze

column2: "Nna Jeremia kɔr Ahikam ba Gedalia nkyɛn wɔ Mizpa
column3: na ɔkɛtsenaa ne nkyɛn wɔ ɔman a wɔaka asaase no do no mu."

column2: "Afei ber a dɔm no hɔn asafohen a wɔwɔ nhaban mu no
column3: mekyerɛ hɔn na hɔn mbarimba no
column4: wɔtsee dɛ Babilɔnhen ahyɛ Ahikam ba Gedalia ambrado wɔ asaase no do
column8: na asaase no do akɔhweaban a wɔammfa hɔn ndɔmmum annkɔ Babilɔn no mu bi ahyɛ n'ase no;"

column4: na Karea mba Johanan na Jonatan

column2: "Na Safan ba Ahikam ne ba Gedalia kaa ntam kyerɛɛ hɔn na hɔn mbarimba no
column4: Mma hom nnsuro dɛ hom bɔsom Kaldeafo no: na hom ntsena asaase no do
Mebɛtsena Mizpa megyina Kaldeafo a wɔbɛba hɛn nkyɛn no enyim: na hom dze
column5: hom mboaboa nsa na ɔpɛber nduadzewa na ngo ano
column6: na hom mfa ngugu hom ndzɛmba mu
column7: na hom ntsenatsena hom nkurow a hom afefa no mu."

column2: "Dɛmara so na Judafo a wɔwɔ Moab
column5: na hɔn a wɔwɔ asaase no nyina do nyinara
column6: wɔtsee dɛ Babilɔnhen egya Juda nkaa
column7: na dɛ ɔdze Safan ba Ahikam ne ba Gedalia edzi hɔn do ɔpanyin no;"

column2: "nna Judafo no nyina sanee fii mbea a wɔpaam hɔn kɔree no do bae
column6: na wɔboaboaa nsa na ɔpɛber nduadzewa piigyan ara ano."

column3: na dɔm a wɔwɔ haban mu n'asafohen no
column7: Ana inyim dɛ Ammonmba hɔn hen Baalis asoma Netania ba Ismael dɛ omboku wo? Na Ahikam ba Gedalia anngye hɔn enndzi."

column2: "Nna Karea ba Johanan see Gedalia wɔ Mizpa wɔ nsumaa mu
column7: na nyimpa biara runnhu: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na oboku wo
column8: ma Judafo a wɔaboa ano aba wo nkyɛn no nyinara mbɔ mpetse

column2: "Na Ahikam ba Gedalia see Karea ba Johanan
column4: Mma nnyɛ dɛm adze yi: na atorsɛm na eka no Ismael ho yi."
